long_description: The Swiss-Tech Mini-Stretch LED flashlight is a lightweight, compact flashlight that can be used as a beam or, when placed on a flat surface in the open position, it functions as a mini lantern. Triangular shape is easy to hold; lanyard can be worn on wrist or used to hang the light. Pull out to open for lantern position; push in to use as a flashlight. Bright LED bulb. Four LR41 batteries included. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Swiss-Tech Mini-Stretch LED flashlight is a lightweight, compact flashlight that can be used as a beam or, when placed on a flat surface in the open position, it functions as a mini lantern.
